name: Gossip Market
description:
- Balance angle control the price

- You can see how many actions you have beside the price

- Buying will use 10% of your capital

- Selling will use 50% of your actions (or all, if < 10)

- You can drag and drop rumors where you want (but I advise you to drop rumor on balance)

Good luck !

Fun facts : 

- First time I do a jam solo !

- I wanted to set global ranking with your place matching the real stat of richess per human on earth, but the plot is so much a nonsense that it just made my unity crash ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

- It was supposed to be somewhat multiplayer, but I literally spent 2 days on making something that works with UItoolkit, so... Sorry :sob: 

- all the "sound design" was made by mouth without any modification
